name: vitepress-ydkjs
description: The You Don't Know JS Yet (book series) - 2nd Edition in vitepress generator. It will be updated automatically every day.

scripts.pull: cd docs/ydkjs && git checkout 2nd-ed && git pull && cd ../..
scripts.dev: yarn stash && yarn pull && yarn replace && vitepress dev docs
scripts.build: yarn stash && yarn pull && yarn replace && vitepress build docs
